programme.title: ...Make You Laugh Out Loud
programme.desc: From Christmas as youve never experienced it before, with out-of-tune carol singers, Santa getting stuck, ungrateful children and exploding Christmas puddings - to OAPs, kids and even blundering burglars, six brand spanking new topics are given the trademark LOL treatment, combining user-generated footage with comic narration by comedian Iain Lee. Theres a treat too for animal lovers with a Puppies special featuring some of the cutest, as well as funniest, puppy clips on the web.

programme.title: The Dog Rescuers
programme.desc: Baxter is a Shih-Tzu that was discovered abandoned in an empty house on the outskirts of Manchester; thin and with extremely matted fur. Inspector Lyndsey Taylor comes to the rescue, but until all that fur is removed, nobody knows what lies beneath.

programme.title: Best Of Pets
programme.desc: Another episode of Best of Pets with funny pet clips.

programme.title: Cute Pet Guide
programme.desc: The meerkat king from "Madagascar" is funny, but meerkats in real life are well-behaved, cuddly and they heal our hearts! Pocket sized pets are currently all the rage, but there are details you need to pay attention to when raising them. For example, hedgehogs are highly defensive, timid sugar gliders will harm themselves without being next to their owners, and cute guinea pigs like Norman from the movie "The Secret Life of Pets" are easily abandoned due to being easy to obtain and raise, etc. Dont worry, experts will teach you how to raise them! Come to a restaurant in Kaohsiung to get up close with Rocket Raccoon from "The Avengers"!

programme.title: Zoo Vet At Large
programme.desc: At Flamingoland, the birth of a rare baby white-crowned mangabey monkey made headlines around the world. The keepers have raised her after she was abandoned by her parents -V now Dr. Matt has been called in to oversee the big family reunion.

programme.title: My House And Other Animals
programme.desc: Meet the modern-day Dr Doolittles with a passion for all creatures great and small: the unsung heroes of the wildlife world, whose homes have become havens for every animal imaginable.

programme.title: Have A Pet Day
programme.desc: Renowned Golden Bell awarded host Sandy Wu takes her beloved dog Hershey on outings, inviting celebrities and their adorable pets to join in the fun. Beyond exploring nature, the show delves into heartfelt conversations about the journey of pet ownership and shares touching stories amid delightful scenery and cuisine. The program features various enjoyable activities where owners and pets can bond, creating unforgettable memories through laughter and tears.

programme.desc: The charm of cute rabbits is irresistible! An old man raised hundreds of rabbits?! Playful little rabbits are spoiled yet timid! programme.title: Zoo Vet At Large
programme.desc: Dr. Matt has a heavyweight problem to tackle -V Kifarou, one of Flamingolands male white rhinos, has a skin infection. At Matts surgery, he operates on a kestrel with a broken wing. When wildlife rescuer Jean Thorpe arrives to collect the patient, Matt has another bundle for her, a poorly duck with suspected lead poisoning.

programme.title: Eat Your Greens
programme.desc: Going green isnt just a trend; its a no-brainer! When the veggies are in season and the prices are at their lowest, Frankies colorful recipes and zero waste tips will have you celebrating the savings with fresh spring produce.

programme.title: Homemade-ish
programme.desc: Last minute company leaving you in a pinch? Frankie has you covered with these easy recipes featuring store bought staples. With a few Struggle tips, these basic ingredients can be transformed into dishes that will impress your guests.

programme.title: Summer Cookout
programme.desc: Soak up summer with the ultimate outdoor cookout, featuring smashburgers, pasta salad and scrumptious sweets. These classic dishes can be prepared indoors or out, making them the perfect recipes for backyard dinner parties on warm summer nights.

programme.title: Jerkin and GRILLIN
programme.desc: Back from a trip to Negril, Jamaica, chef Derrell Smith brings his favorite dishes back to his own yard! Grillin up Jerk Chicken, Saltfish and Ackee, coconut peas and rice and other Caribbean favorites for his two friends.

programme.title: Happy Birthday to Me
programme.desc: Chef Derrell Smiths birthday and hes treating himself to some self love and a lavish steak dinner inspired by a famous NYC steakhouse. On the menu: Rib Eye Steak with Peppercorn Sauce, Duck Frites, Wedge Salad and a celebratory carrot cake.

programme.title: Brunch Grows Up
programme.desc: Enough with the endless lines and mimosas! Chef Derrell Smith has leveled up his brunch by hosting his own. Todays menu, a "yelluh" grit bowl bar with toppings; Beer Braised Pulled Pork, Chili Fried Eggs, Bang Bang Shrimp and Tajin-rimmed Palomas.

programme.title: Grandma Estelle
programme.desc: Chef Derrell Smiths grandma inspired him in life and in the kitchen. He shares family recipes taking him right back to grandmas table. Hes cookin up Fried Chicken, Mac N Cheese, Collard Green Slaw, Brlee Banana Pudding and Pop-pops moonshine.

programme.title: Farmers Market Finds
programme.desc: Chef Derrell Smith heads to the Farmers Market for the first time. Inspired by rows of fresh fruit, veggies and the local farmers he creates a flavorful meal like Veggie Focaccia, Mushroom Medley Pasta, Spiced Apple Cobbler and a crisp white Sangria.

programme.title: A South Carolina Family Reunion
programme.desc: For his reunion inspired menu Chef Derrell Smith is going back to his roots. Cookin up some modern takes on the family classics including his Garlic Pesto Potato Salad, Salmon Filet, a Herby, Spicy Kale Slaw, and Grilled Fruit Skewers.

programme.title: Pre-Gaming!
programme.desc: As a former NFL player, game days hit a little different. These days chef Derrell Smith isnt on the field, hes changing the game in the kitchen with eats like Philly Cheesesteak Taquitos, Oyster Mushroom Wings and Elote Queso with Chili Lime Chips.

programme.title: Dinner Party
programme.desc: Chef Derrell Smith is hosting a dinner party! Living in KoreaTown, Derrell has fallen in love with its food and culture. Tonight, hes servin up Braised Beef Short Rib with Crispy Rice Cakes, Pickled Cabbage, Glass Noodles Salad and Korean Pancakes.

programme.title: Thankful For Everything
programme.desc: Thanksgiving is here and Chef Derrell Smith is serving up herb cornish hens, cornbread stuffing and cranberry sauce for his main meal. His solo meal is tostones with broccolini and his mystery meal will be filled with traditional holiday favorites.

programme.title: Take-out at Home
programme.desc: Chef Derrell Smith is tackling his favorite take-out foods at home, serving up Chinese American menu staples with General Tsos chicken, bok choy and delicious egg rolls. His mystery meal will hopefully be restaurant worthy and packed with flavors.

programme.title: Meet the Parents
programme.desc: Chef Derrell Smith is making Steakhouse classics for his main meal; for his solo meal hes putting his own twist on a traditional eggs benedict. His mystery meal will of course be a surprise but will hopefully win over even the pickiest parentals.

programme.title: Tis the Season
programme.desc: Its holiday time and Chef Derrell is feeling festive and making a feast fit for a king with crown roast and sweet potato gratin. A Monte Cristo sandwich screams Christmas for a solo dish and is delivered with sweet and snowy powdered sugar on top.

programme.title: The Wonderful World of Pizza
programme.desc: Frankie makes pizza magic with two incredible doughs, turning his kitchen into a pizza party with grilled sausage pizza, cheesy Grandma Pies, golden Panzerotti, and a sweet dessert pizza topped with ricotta, berries, and honey.

programme.title: Italian Smokehouse
programme.desc: Frankie fires up a steakhouse-style spread with Italian flair from golden beets and buttery mushrooms to a sizzling Bistecca alla Fiorentina steak with salmoriglio sauce, and a smooth cold brew affogato granita.

programme.title: Lunch That Goes the Distance
programme.desc: Frankie fuels up for action making hot Oatmeal, and Energy Date Balls, before he cooks up the perfect post-ride feast of cheesy Juicy Lucy Burgers, Ramp-loaded pasta salad, and a maple ginger switchel to cool it all down.

programme.title: Pasta From Scratch
programme.desc: Frankie explores his Italian roots, pairing each pasta shape with its perfect saucefrom Cavatelli with Super Green Sauce to Pappardelle in pork ragout, ricotta Gnocchi with punchy anchovy pecorino, and cozy Squash Orzotto with bloomed poppy seeds.

programme.title: Getting the Band Back Together
programme.desc: Frankie reunites his old band for a jam session and a spin on a college-era classic featuring Shoyu Ramen with Tare Eggs, sweet and savory Chicken Meatballs, Seaweed Cucumber Salad, and a crispy Okonomiyaki pancake.

programme.title: Pancake Stacks and Snacks for Two
programme.desc: Frankie flips the script for his wife Heather making breakfast for dinner featuring Banana Maple Pancakes, Eggs Benedict with prosciutto cotto, Home Fries with Bloody Mary Ketchup, Sausage Scrapple, and a boozy Espresso Milkshake.

programme.title: Meals Under $7
programme.desc: At a loss when your pantry is empty? With these recipes, you can walk into any grocery store with only $7 and walk out with everything you need for an entire meal. Because yes, you can whip up a nutritious meal at an affordable price!

programme.title: We Knead Pizza
programme.desc: Cancel the pizza delivery, its time to save money and build your pies from scratch. With three different pizza styles, youre bound to find one that satisfies your craving without digging into your wallet.

programme.title: The Wonderful World of Pizza
programme.desc: Frankie makes pizza magic with two incredible doughs, turning his kitchen into a pizza party with grilled sausage pizza, cheesy Grandma Pies, golden Panzerotti, and a sweet dessert pizza topped with ricotta, berries, and honey.

programme.title: One Pot Meals
programme.desc: Any true struggle cook knows theres nothing better than a one pot dinner. Not only is there hardly any cleanup at the end, but the prep is minimal too, which means hunger satisfaction is imminent. Who says meals cant be cheap, easy and delicious?

programme.title: Take-out at Home
programme.desc: Chef Derrell Smith is tackling his favorite take-out foods at home, serving up Chinese American menu staples with General Tsos chicken, bok choy and delicious egg rolls. His mystery meal will hopefully be restaurant worthy and packed with flavors.

programme.title: Loaded Dogs And Classic Cocktails in San Diego
programme.desc: Frankie Celenza heads to San Diego to sample a modern spin on classic deli fare, heavily loaded low-riding hot dogs, frosty And fruity Taiwanese snow ice, and fancy French cocktails from a rotating carousel bar.

programme.title: Tacos, Brats, And Biscuits in Austin
programme.desc: Frankie Celenza goes down south to try Austins best bets - breakfast tacos are on the itinerary, as well as a bangin beer garden And sausage house, loaded biscuits, and dessert pancakes to boot! Austin may be weird but the food is fabulous.

programme.title: Smash Burgers And A Slice in Los Angeles
programme.desc: Frankie Celenza heads to all the buzzworthy spots in LA - cooking up calamari steak at a classic Mexican joint, tasting taro root donuts with fun flavors, grabbing a guanciale slice, and hopping on the line to make cheesy scrumptious smash burgers.

programme.title: Pierogies, Bagels, and Ramen in NYC
programme.desc: Frankie Celenza takes a LOT of bites out of the big apple as he samples warm pillowy bagels And schmear, grabs pierogies at an old school Ukrainian spot, gets the scoop on innovative ice cream flavors, and slurps up some real ramen.

programme.title: Brooklyns Best Pizza Tour
programme.desc: Frankie Celenza goes on the best pizza party crawl that Brooklyn has to offer. Hell try a Neo-Neapolitan pie, a classic coal oven favorite, hell hit up a modern joint with innovative toppings, and a cozy Italian-owned neighborhood spot.

programme.title: BBQ Bowls And Puffy Tacos in San Antonio
programme.desc: Frankie Celenza gets his spurs on to sample San Antonios best all-day brunch, taste some epic puffy tacos at a classic car joint, create colorful conchitas, and bask in the beauty of BBQ Thai curry bowls.

programme.title: Dumplings, Steam Buns, and Dim Sum, Oh My!
programme.desc: In a city with over 60 Michelin star restaurants, one brother will live and dine like a king, while the other will check out the citys more affordable street food scene.

programme.title: Simplicity vs. Splendor on the Seaside
programme.desc: Soaking in the beauty and elegance of the French Riviera, Marko and Alex are in Nice to enjoy the simplicity and splendor of this seaside city.

programme.title: Keep Austin Weird
programme.desc: In the state capital of Texas, Marko and Alex see what Austin has to offer. An eclectic city known for its music and cuisine, the guys brave the Texas heat and check out what keeps Austin weird.

programme.title: Levels of Luxury in Laos
programme.desc: Sandwiched between Thailand, Vietnam, and Cambodia, Laos is a destination often overlooked by tourists. Marko and Alex are uncovering the hidden gem of Vientiane, the capital city, to see what goes on in this sleepy town beside the Mekong River.

programme.title: The Gainful Grace of Geneva
programme.desc: Marko and Alex find themselves in the prosperous and pristine city of Geneva, Switzerland. A city nestled alongside a beautiful glacier-fed lake, the guys will explore the riches Geneva has to offer.

programme.title: The Thriving Traditions of Taipei
programme.desc: Welcome to the buzzing capital of Taiwan. A rich blend of cultures, old meets new in this thriving metropolis of Taipei. Marko and Alex eat their way through the city, experiencing some unique traditions along the way.

programme.title: The Lions Share of Lyon
programme.desc: Marko and Alex head to Lyon, France, a city known for its gastronomy and endless history.

programme.title: Oceanside in Okinawa
programme.desc: Ocean breeze, turquoise waters and a whole lot of amazing cuisine. Marko and Alex are soaking up that island life in Okinawa, Japan and learning what makes it so unique.

programme.title: Genoa From Above and Below
programme.desc: In Genoa, the brothers cruise the streets, while one of them gets a taste for the lavish lifestyle of Italys Northwestern port. They take in all the views: heads in the clouds on a high-flying funicular, and just above water at the local aquarium.

programme.title: The L.A. Lifestyle
programme.desc: Green juice, avocado toast, and surfers galore. Marko and Alex are back home in Los Angeles to explore their town, staycation style. From downtown to the beach, the guys do everything fun under the sun in the city of angels.

programme.title: Origins to Originals
programme.desc: From roast chicken to smash burgers to hot sauce, Stephanie Izard meets three different chefs putting their own California-inspired spin on food from their heritage by remixing traditional recipes that center local, fresh ingredients.

programme.title: Home Cooking
programme.desc: From a homerun Greek dinner party series to a backyard thats become a gourmet deli to a Burmese pop up running out of an apartment kitchen, Stephanie Izard meets cooks finding ingenious ways to serve mouth-watering food out of their houses.

programme.title: Family Style
programme.desc: From brothers selling moms Syrian food to a Filipino family remixing a classic dessert to a mom and son running an Indian restaurant out of their house, Stephanie meets multi-gen families turning family recipes into smash hit food business.

programme.title: Unique Eats
programme.desc: From a chef making Italian pasta with Mexican flavors to a groundbreaking functional cocktail bar to a couple that roasts whole goats behind a tire shop, Stephanie Izard finds unique eateries serving up one-of-a-kind food.

programme.title: Comfort Foods
programme.desc: Latin-inspired ice cream to Caribbean, Channa curry doubles to gourmet, deli sandwiches; Stephanie Izard shows what comfort food means to 3 very different cooks and learns how they turned their childhood memories into thriving food businesses.

programme.title: Secret Pizza
programme.desc: With the help of a guide, Stephanie Izard explores the underground secret pizzas of Los Angeles, including an off-menu pizza at a cinnamon bun pop-up, apartment-cooked limited drop specials and gourmet sourdough pies made in pizza vans mobile oven.

programme.desc: Welcome to the buzzing capital of Taiwan. A rich blend of cultures, old meets new in this thriving metropolis of Taipei. Marko and Alex eat their way through the city, experiencing some unique traditions along the way.

programme.title: Oceanside in Okinawa

programme.title: Genoa From Above and Below
programme.desc: In Genoa, the brothers cruise the streets, while one of them gets a taste for the lavish lifestyle of Italys Northwestern port. They take in all the views: heads in the clouds on a high-flying funicular, and just above water at the local aquarium.

programme.title: The L.A. Lifestyle
programme.desc: Green juice, avocado toast, and surfers galore. Marko and Alex are back home in Los Angeles to explore their town, staycation style. From downtown to the beach, the guys do everything fun under the sun in the city of angels.

programme.title: The Gainful Grace of Geneva

programme.title: Oceanside in Okinawa

programme.title: Pre-Gaming!
programme.desc: As a former NFL player, game days hit a little different. These days chef Derrell Smith isnt on the field, hes changing the game in the kitchen with eats like Philly Cheesesteak Taquitos, Oyster Mushroom Wings and Elote Queso with Chili Lime Chips.

programme.title: Dinner Party
programme.desc: Chef Derrell Smith is hosting a dinner party! Living in KoreaTown, Derrell has fallen in love with its food and culture. Tonight, hes servin up Braised Beef Short Rib with Crispy Rice Cakes, Pickled Cabbage, Glass Noodles Salad and Korean Pancakes.

programme.title: Thankful For Everything
programme.desc: Thanksgiving is here and Chef Derrell Smith is serving up herb cornish hens, cornbread stuffing and cranberry sauce for his main meal. His solo meal is tostones with broccolini and his mystery meal will be filled with traditional holiday favorites.

programme.title: Take-out at Home
programme.desc: Chef Derrell Smith is tackling his favorite take-out foods at home, serving up Chinese American menu staples with General Tsos chicken, bok choy and delicious egg rolls. His mystery meal will hopefully be restaurant worthy and packed with flavors.

programme.title: Loaded Dogs And Classic Cocktails in San Diego
programme.desc: Frankie Celenza heads to San Diego to sample a modern spin on classic deli fare, heavily loaded low-riding hot dogs, frosty And fruity Taiwanese snow ice, and fancy French cocktails from a rotating carousel bar.

programme.title: Tacos, Brats, And Biscuits in Austin
programme.desc: Frankie Celenza goes down south to try Austins best bets - breakfast tacos are on the itinerary, as well as a bangin beer garden And sausage house, loaded biscuits, and dessert pancakes to boot! Austin may be weird but the food is fabulous.

programme.title: Smash Burgers And A Slice in Los Angeles
programme.desc: Frankie Celenza heads to all the buzzworthy spots in LA - cooking up calamari steak at a classic Mexican joint, tasting taro root donuts with fun flavors, grabbing a guanciale slice, and hopping on the line to make cheesy scrumptious smash burgers.

programme.title: Pierogies, Bagels, and Ramen in NYC
programme.desc: Frankie Celenza takes a LOT of bites out of the big apple as he samples warm pillowy bagels And schmear, grabs pierogies at an old school Ukrainian spot, gets the scoop on innovative ice cream flavors, and slurps up some real ramen.

programme.title: Brooklyns Best Pizza Tour
programme.desc: Frankie Celenza goes on the best pizza party crawl that Brooklyn has to offer. Hell try a Neo-Neapolitan pie, a classic coal oven favorite, hell hit up a modern joint with innovative toppings, and a cozy Italian-owned neighborhood spot.

programme.title: BBQ Bowls And Puffy Tacos in San Antonio
programme.desc: Frankie Celenza gets his spurs on to sample San Antonios best all-day brunch, taste some epic puffy tacos at a classic car joint, create colorful conchitas, and bask in the beauty of BBQ Thai curry bowls.

programme.title: Dumplings, Steam Buns, and Dim Sum, Oh My!
programme.desc: In a city with over 60 Michelin star restaurants, one brother will live and dine like a king, while the other will check out the citys more affordable street food scene.

programme.title: Simplicity vs. Splendor on the Seaside
programme.desc: Soaking in the beauty and elegance of the French Riviera, Marko and Alex are in Nice to enjoy the simplicity and splendor of this seaside city.

programme.title: Keep Austin Weird
programme.desc: In the state capital of Texas, Marko and Alex see what Austin has to offer. An eclectic city known for its music and cuisine, the guys brave the Texas heat and check out what keeps Austin weird.

programme.title: Swing Kids

programme.title: Confession

programme.title: Decision to Leave

programme.title: The Ghost Game

programme.title: The Swindlers

programme.title: For the Emperor

programme.title: Rolling
programme.desc: Juri with depression is stuck at home during COVID. As her mother went visit Juris grandmother, Juri has to run their Kimbap restaurant until her mother returns.

programme.title: Gyeong-ahs Daughter

programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E071
programme.desc: Federico confiesa a Fernanda que no estuvo de acuerdo con hacer el video falso contra Victoria, pero que accedio para que ella no dudara de el; sin embargo, al saber que Victoria est libre y ella ahora es la duea de Cantarrana lo hace pensar que a ella en realidad no le importa quien asesino a Leopoldo. Leopoldo quiere que Marisa les diga a Victoria y Federico que alguien lo vio con vida; la mujer se niega porque sabe que eso hara que el se fuera de su casa y ella y Margarita quieren que se quede a su lado por siempre.Luego de escuchar como fue la supuesta negociacion de Jack con Fernanda por el video contra Victoria, Nicols golpea a Jack y se marcha indignado.

programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E072
programme.desc: Hilario quiere que Adelaida lo acompae a Cantarrana para que convenza a Victoria de que regrese a la capital y deje de sabotear la hacienda, pues con eso solo se est poniendo en peligro; la seora acepta acompaarlo porque se trata de su hija. Victoria se compadece de Federico cuando este, conteniendo el llanto, admite que fue el quien asesino a su pap. Nicols llega a la hacienda con Victoria prendida en fiebre y desvanecida; el joven explica a Adelaida y Fernanda que la encontro sola en medio del camino y ya ordeno a varios peones que fueran en busca de Federico; la seora Alcoy, que no aprueba que la muchacha haya sido llevada hasta la que ahora es su casa, no puede dejar de avergonzarse cuando Adelaida le reprocha su falta de humanidad.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E80
programme.desc: Camila huye de un motorizado que trata de alcanzarla y es sorprendida violentamente por un hombre que la amenaza si se casa con Ezequiel, eso ser su funeral. Ezequiel y ella deducen que puede ser Marcelina la autora intelectual, por su deseo de impedir la boda.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E81
programme.desc: Ezequiel dice que la boda ser en 15 das; Camila aterrada, desahoga su tristeza con Jeli. Tambien Sebastin intenta infructuosamente de convencerla de que no debe

programme.title: El Desprecio - S01:E101
programme.desc: Clara thanks Raul for everything he did to save her life; unable to contain himself, Veladro kisses Clara; the latter begs him to forget her.

programme.title: El Desprecio - S01:E102
programme.desc: Sure that he has nothing to lose, Cyril plans how to liquidate Pandora.

programme.title: Corazon Traicionado - S01:E101
programme.desc: Gertrudis warns Claudio of the police operation to find him, but he still refuses to undergo surgery to change his face; he prefers to flee the country, even without her - Detective Janet visits Isabel in her apartment, she wants to give her a new opportunity to tell the whole truth about what happened the day her brother Pablo died - It is time to listen to Lorenas testimony in the trial against her.

programme.title: Te Tengo en Salsa - S01:E77
programme.desc: Una furiosa Adriana busca a Francesca para exigirle una explicacion del por que se unio a Salvatore Perroni para destruirle la vida a Patricia.

programme.title: Te Tengo en Salsa - S01:E78
programme.desc: Salvatore trata de quitarle el arma a Azalea pero esta, enajenada, golpea a su esposo con un jarron dejndolo sin sentido y huye dispuesta a arremeter contra Adriana.

programme.title: Te Tengo en Salsa - S01:E79
programme.desc: Adriana trata de convencer a Carlos para que se den una nueva oportunidad pero el est convencido de que no la merece y se marcha.

programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E072
programme.desc: Hilario quiere que Adelaida lo acompae a Cantarrana para que convenza a Victoria de que regrese a la capital y deje de sabotear la hacienda, pues con eso solo se est poniendo en peligro; la seora acepta acompaarlo porque se trata de su hija. Victoria se compadece de Federico cuando este, conteniendo el llanto, admite que fue el quien asesino a su pap. Nicols llega a la hacienda con Victoria prendida en fiebre y desvanecida; el joven explica a Adelaida y Fernanda que la encontro sola en medio del camino y ya ordeno a varios peones que fueran en busca de Federico; la seora Alcoy, que no aprueba que la muchacha haya sido llevada hasta la que ahora es su casa, no puede dejar de avergonzarse cuando Adelaida le reprocha su falta de humanidad.

programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E073
programme.desc: Hilario quiere ir con Nicols a buscar a Federico y Fernanda, furiosa, advierte a su medio hermano que no va a venderle Cantarrana como quiere para que aprenda a vivir como el don nadie que es. Victoria le confa a Clementina que sabe que si Federico mato a Leopoldo fue por cosas que ella hizo y eso la haca sentir que tena una deuda con el, pero ahora no le debe nada porque le salvo la vida; sin embargo, ella est consciente de que los Del Casal y ella son enemigos a muerte y solo le queda esperar cul ser el proximo muerto en esa guerra.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E82
programme.desc: Camila busca excusas para demorar la boda; Elda y Luciano concluyen que solo Rosa Blanco puede detener esta locura. Fausto maquina un plan para asesinar a Ezequiel, a la salida de la iglesia, y tambien de una vez eliminar a Rosa Blanco.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E83
programme.desc: Camila est a punto de dejar su venganza; e irse con Max pero al saber del regreso de Rosa Blanco, cambia su decision. Ezequiel, iracundo hace preparar una cena ntima, solo con Camila, donde comprobar el engao y la traicion.

programme.title: El Desprecio - S01:E102
programme.desc: Sure that he has nothing to lose, Cyril plans how to liquidate Pandora.

programme.title: El Desprecio - S01:E103
programme.desc: Israel demands Pastora to open the door to the room; although he hears his brother on the other side.

programme.title: Corazon Traicionado - S01:E102
programme.desc: Mara Lourdes makes her closing speech as Prosecutor of the case and asks for the maximum punishment for Lorena for having murdered Marco Aurelio Corona - Malena proposes to Alfonso that they get married as soon as possible, so that he can guarantee the care and protection of Jose Pablo if she has to go to jail - Patricias closing speech is forceful and fierce, where she makes it very clear that there is not enough evidence to prove Lorenas guilt.

programme.title: Corazon Traicionado - S01:E103
programme.desc: Judge Echeverri calls the jury to deliberate to give the verdict in the case against Lorena. Malena is upset because she knows she will have to be away from Jose Pablo, but she also fears for what might happen to him in jail - Lorena goes to the Corona house for her son; but there she also meets Alberto.

Nicols llega a la hacienda con Victoria prendida en fiebre y desvanecida; el joven explica a Adelaida y Fernanda que la encontro sola en medio del camino y ya ordeno a varios peones que fueran en busca de Federico; la seora Alcoy, que no aprueba que la muchacha haya sido llevada hasta la que ahora es su casa, no puede dejar de avergonzarse cuando Adelaida le reprocha su falta de humanidad.

programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E073
programme.desc: Hilario quiere ir con Nicols a buscar a Federico y Fernanda, furiosa, advierte a su medio hermano que no va a venderle Cantarrana como quiere para que aprenda a vivir como el don nadie que es. Victoria le confa a Clementina que sabe que si Federico mato a Leopoldo fue por cosas que ella hizo y eso la haca sentir que tena una deuda con el, pero ahora no le debe nada porque le salvo la vida; sin embargo, ella est consciente de que los Del Casal y ella son enemigos a muerte y solo le queda esperar cul ser el proximo muerto en esa guerra.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E82
programme.desc: Camila busca excusas para demorar la boda; Elda y Luciano concluyen que solo Rosa Blanco puede detener esta locura. Fausto maquina un plan para asesinar a Ezequiel, a la salida de la iglesia, y tambien de una vez eliminar a Rosa Blanco.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E83
programme.desc: Camila est a punto de dejar su venganza; e irse con Max pero al saber del regreso de Rosa Blanco, cambia su decision. Ezequiel, iracundo hace preparar una cena ntima, solo con Camila, donde comprobar el engao y la traicion.

programme.title: El Desprecio - S01:E102
programme.desc: Sure that he has nothing to lose, Cyril plans how to liquidate Pandora.

programme.title: El Desprecio - S01:E103
programme.desc: Israel demands Pastora to open the door to the room; although he hears his brother on the other side.

programme.title: Corazon Traicionado - S01:E102
programme.desc: Mara Lourdes makes her closing speech as Prosecutor of the case and asks for the maximum punishment for Lorena for having murdered Marco Aurelio Corona - Malena proposes to Alfonso that they get married as soon as possible, so that he can guarantee the care and protection of Jose Pablo if she has to go to jail - Patricias closing speech is forceful and fierce, where she makes it very clear that there is not enough evidence to prove Lorenas guilt.

programme.title: Te Tengo en Salsa - S01:E78
programme.desc: Salvatore trata de quitarle el arma a Azalea pero esta, enajenada, golpea a su esposo con un jarron dejndolo sin sentido y huye dispuesta a arremeter contra Adriana.

programme.title: Te Tengo en Salsa - S01:E79
programme.desc: Adriana trata de convencer a Carlos para que se den una nueva oportunidad pero el est convencido de que no la merece y se marcha.

programme.title: Te Tengo en Salsa - S01:E80
programme.desc: Los Perroni se impresionan ante lo ordinarios que son los miembros de la familia Chaparro, con quienes tendrn que compartir su casa debido a la exigencias de Adriana.

programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E073
programme.desc: Hilario quiere ir con Nicols a buscar a Federico y Fernanda, furiosa, advierte a su medio hermano que no va a venderle Cantarrana como quiere para que aprenda a vivir como el don nadie que es. Victoria le confa a Clementina que sabe que si Federico mato a Leopoldo fue por cosas que ella hizo y eso la haca sentir que tena una deuda con el, pero ahora no le debe nada porque le salvo la vida; sin embargo, ella est consciente de que los Del Casal y ella son enemigos a muerte y solo le queda esperar cul ser el proximo muerto en esa guerra.

programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E074
programme.desc: La sorpresa se apodera de Nicols cuando Victoria, para demostrarle que ella es tan malvada como el cree y darle una razon para odiarla, admite haber matado a Leopoldo Alcoy. Fernanda contrata a Grillo, un hombre que se va a encargar de secuestrar a Hilario para darle una buena paliza; Leopoldo sabe que tiene que darle explicaciones a su familia de los motivos que tuvo para desaparecer, pero primero quiere conversar a solas con Federico sobre lo ocurrido. Victoria le confa a Clementina que le dijo a Nicols que fue ella quien mato a Leopoldo porque est convencida de que ni un milagro va a acabar con el odio entre ellos.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E83
programme.desc: Camila est a punto de dejar su venganza; e irse con Max pero al saber del regreso de Rosa Blanco, cambia su decision. Ezequiel, iracundo hace preparar una cena ntima, solo con Camila, donde comprobar el engao y la traicion.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E84
programme.desc: Al encontrar a Max y Camila abrazados, Octavia le pide a Camila que deje a Ezequiel pes ella lo ama. Camila, rechaza esa peticion pes interfiere en sus planes e intereses. En un juego de palabras con Camila, Ezequiel trata de desenmascarar la traicion.

programme.title: El Desprecio - S01:E103
programme.desc: Israel demands Pastora to open the door to the room; although he hears his brother on the other side.

programme.title: El Desprecio - S01:E104
programme.desc: In the best of performances, Pastora swears she doesnt mind going to jail as long as Raul is safe.

programme.title: Corazon Traicionado - S01:E103
programme.desc: Judge Echeverri calls the jury to deliberate to give the verdict in the case against Lorena. Malena is upset because she knows she will have to be away from Jose Pablo, but she also fears for what might happen to him in jail - Lorena goes to the Corona house for her son; but there she also meets Alberto.

programme.title: Corazon Traicionado - S01:E104
programme.desc: They are alone together and Alberto insists on knowing who killed his father, because he still doesnt believe her. Hurt, he claims all the damage she did to him and challenges her to prove the truth she speaks of. The Chief of Police informs Omar of a movement that drug traffickers are making with medical instruments and equipment, apparently to make a change of face.

programme.title: Te Tengo en Salsa - S01:E79
programme.desc: Adriana trata de convencer a Carlos para que se den una nueva oportunidad pero el est convencido de que no la merece y se marcha.

programme.title: Wardens - S02:E07 - Operation H2O
programme.desc: Being dedicated to safeguarding our precious natural resources in some of the nations most remote places ensures that every workday is exciting.

programme.title: Backcountry Rescue - S01:E06 - Bombs Away
programme.desc: Jamie puts his trust in The New explosives technology to keep ski slopes safe and the local highways open all winter. But his barrage of anti-avalanche bombs is not enough to save everyone.

programme.title: Gold Fever - S21:E09 - Gold, Sweat and Dragons Blood
programme.desc: Tom and Kia explore a mysterious mine in Colorado.

programme.title: Savage Wild - S04:E03 - Black Bear Explosion
programme.desc: Manny explores a Florida swamp swarming with black bears.

programme.title: Carters W.A.R. - S01:E09 - Man and Man Eaters
programme.desc: Ivan Carter learns the truth about what happens when lions and humans live side by side in Africa.

programme.title: Royal Documentaries - S01:E13 - William And Kate One Year On
programme.desc: William and Catherine got married in a fairytale ceremony on April 29, 2011, with more than two billion people tuning in and celebrations happening all around the world.

programme.title: Royal Documentaries - S01:E34 - Prince William And Prince Harry The Next Royal Generation
programme.desc: Prince William and Prince Harry, along with their friends, got as much media attention as todays pop stars, fashion icons, and movie celebs. This documentary explores how this affected their personal lives and friendships, showcasing how they managed their fame alongside their royal responsibilities.

programme.title: Dropped - S05:E07 - Cache Out
programme.desc: With red meat, the Keefer brothers are finally able to replenish their depleted energy, but they arent the only ones looking to survive the winter in the Alaskan wilderness.

programme.title: Dropped - S05:E08 - Bearing Down
programme.desc: The harsh reality of winter sets in, and the Keefer brothers are forced to sleep with one eye open as a grizzly patrols the area around their camp.

programme.title: Wardens - S02:E08 - Operation Warm Springs
programme.desc: Working to protect our treasured natural resources in some of the countrys most secluded spots means theres never a boring day on the job.

programme.title: Backcountry Rescue - S01:E07 - Swoop and Scoop
programme.desc: Wiedie and Chris designed their lives so they can experience all Jackson Hole has to offer. And when a young snowmobilers first ride into the backcountry spins out of control, they join forces with Jess and Flip to execute a perfect swoop and scoop rescue.

programme.title: Gold Fever - S21:E10 - Urban Prospectors
programme.desc: Tom and Kia prospect for gold in the heart of the city.

programme.title: Savage Wild - S04:E05 - River of Drought
programme.desc: We explore a river during a terrible drought in Florida, to see what predators have migrated into it.

programme.title: Savage Wild - S04:E06 - Adventure on the Aucilla River
programme.desc: Manny searches for predators and prey on the Aucilla River, a river that starts in Georgias black water swamps and flows through Florida into the Gulf of Mexico.

programme.title: Carters W.A.R. - S01:E10 - Africas Most Dangerous
programme.desc: Ivan Carter investigates the most dangerous animal in Africa.

programme.title: Royal Documentaries - S01:E17 - Remembering Diana Princess Of Wales
programme.desc: Remembering Diana, Princess of Wales includes scenes from her state funeral and heartfelt words from her closest friends. Its a warm and reflective look at Diana both as a person and a public figure: the queen that never was and the princess wholl always be remembered.

programme.title: Dropped - S08:E10 - Behind The Scenes
programme.desc: Relive all the memorable highlights from Dropped Seasons 1-8 as we dive behind-the-scenes.

programme.title: Dropped - S01:E01 - Edge Of The Earth
programme.desc: In the first episode, Chris and Casey get a glimpse of whats in store for their adventure. It covers the kind of terrain theyll explore, the weather theyll encounter, and the hunting methods theyll use. Plus, it dives into the backstory of this project and how it all got started.

programme.title: Dropped - S01:E02 - On Top Of The World
programme.desc: Chris and Casey trudge through a bunch of streams, wade through long patches of soggy muskeg, and climb a mountain while searching for a big caribou bull. During the journey, Chris hurts his knee again, making him wonder if hell be able to continue the hunt.

programme.title: Dropped - S01:E03 - Down The River
programme.desc: The guys head downstream looking for Yukon Bull Moose, spending two days traveling nearly 20 miles along the river. Chris and Casey keep going until they set up their moose camp. The new spot is a bit unsettling because they hear a grizzly just outside their tent.

programme.title: Desperate Hours - S01:E01 - Volcanoes
programme.desc: The Greatest Show on Earth is also the most ferocious. Desperate Hours looks at the destructive force of volcanoes and examines the eruptions in Montserrat which devastated half a Caribbean Island, the 1973 eruption on the Icelandic island of Heimaey, the 2010 eruption Eyjafjallajokull which blocked air travel in Europe, the Merapi eruption in Indonesia, and Mount Nyiragongo in Congo, and the super-volcano in Yellowstone.

programme.title: Desperate Hours - S01:E02 - Earthquake
programme.desc: When the Earth really moves, it means disaster on an epic scale. Desperate Hours looks at the destructive force of earthquakes and looks at the 2015 Kathmandu earthquake in Nepal, the 2008 Sichuan earthquake in China where an estimated 10,000 children were trapped in collapsed school buildings, a 1960 Puerto Mont earthquake in Chile, the 2010 Port-au-Princ earthquake in Haiti, and the 2005 Kashmir earthquake in Pakistan.

programme.title: Desperate Hours - S01:E03 - Epidemic
programme.desc: Desperate Hours looks at major epidemics including the African Ebola outbreak in Sudan which eventually led to cases in the United State and England, the Indian Smallpox outbreak in Bihar, the African Cholera outbreak, the SARS outbreak in Guanghzhou China, and the Bird Flu of Hong Kong.

programme.title: Desperate Hours - S01:E04 - Wind
programme.desc: Desperate Hours looks at the destructive power of wind. From the devastating power of Hurricane Katrina in New Orleans to the destructive Cyclone Nargis in Myanmar, the 1960 storm Hurricane Donna in Florida, Tornado Joplin in Missouri, and Hurricane Sandy in New York.

programme.title: Desperate Hours - S01:E05 - Fire
programme.desc: The blazing terror of a fire can match anything in creation for sheer menace. Desperate Hours looks at the destructive force of fires including the Black Saturday Bushfires in Victoria Australia, the Station Nightclub fire in Rhode Island, the LInnovation Department Store fire in Brussels Belgium, the Armoury fire in Lagos Nigeria, and the Binhai New Development Zone Fire in Tianjin China.

programme.title: The Trail - S01:E01 - Into the High Lonesome
programme.desc: Laramy Sasquatch Miller sets off on The Trail with his trusty horse 7, to test his survival skills and pay homage to mountain men of the past. Saying goodbye to his family, Laramy and 7 have to battle the elements, build shelter, live off of the land, and survive a 30-day trek through the backcountry.

programme.title: The Trail - S01:E02 - Camp Otis
programme.desc: Modern-day mountain man Laramy Miller sets out on the trail to experience life in the high lonesome.

programme.title: The Trail- S01:E03 - Relocation
programme.desc: Laramy realizes that game is scarce because of the wolves and he decides to put some distance between himself and the pack. Time to break down camp and move to a new location.

programme.title: The Trail - S01:E04 - White Death
programme.desc: Snow, what the mountain men called white death, stops Laramy in his tracks. In addition, his trusty horse 7 has suffered a leg injury. Laramy must take care of Seven, battle through hunger, and survive the snowfall.

programme.title: Dropped - S08:E10 - Behind The Scenes
programme.desc: Relive all the memorable highlights from Dropped Seasons 1-8 as we dive behind-the-scenes.

Saying goodbye to his family, Laramy and 7 have to battle the elements, build shelter, live off of the land, and survive a 30-day trek through the backcountry.

programme.title: The Trail - S01:E02 - Camp Otis
programme.desc: Modern-day mountain man Laramy Miller sets out on the trail to experience life in the high lonesome.

programme.title: The Trail- S01:E03 - Relocation
programme.desc: Laramy realizes that game is scarce because of the wolves and he decides to put some distance between himself and the pack. Time to break down camp and move to a new location.

programme.title: The Trail - S01:E04 - White Death
programme.desc: Snow, what the mountain men called white death, stops Laramy in his tracks. In addition, his trusty horse 7 has suffered a leg injury. Laramy must take care of Seven, battle through hunger, and survive the snowfall.

programme.title: Dropped - S08:E10 - Behind The Scenes
programme.desc: Relive all the memorable highlights from Dropped Seasons 1-8 as we dive behind-the-scenes.

programme.title: Dropped - S01:E01 - Edge Of The Earth
programme.desc: In the first episode, Chris and Casey get a glimpse of whats in store for their adventure. It covers the kind of terrain theyll explore, the weather theyll encounter, and the hunting methods theyll use. Plus, it dives into the backstory of this project and how it all got started.

programme.title: Dropped - S01:E02 - On Top Of The World
programme.desc: Chris and Casey trudge through a bunch of streams, wade through long patches of soggy muskeg, and climb a mountain while searching for a big caribou bull. During the journey, Chris hurts his knee again, making him wonder if hell be able to continue the hunt.

programme.title: Dropped - S01:E03 - Down The River
programme.desc: The guys head downstream looking for Yukon Bull Moose, spending two days traveling nearly 20 miles along the river. Chris and Casey keep going until they set up their moose camp. The new spot is a bit unsettling because they hear a grizzly just outside their tent.

programme.title: Desperate Hours - S01:E01 - Volcanoes
programme.desc: The Greatest Show on Earth is also the most ferocious. Desperate Hours looks at the destructive force of volcanoes and examines the eruptions in Montserrat which devastated half a Caribbean Island, the 1973 eruption on the Icelandic island of Heimaey, the 2010 eruption Eyjafjallajokull which blocked air travel in Europe, the Merapi eruption in Indonesia, and Mount Nyiragongo in Congo, and the super-volcano in Yellowstone.

programme.title: Desperate Hours - S01:E02 - Earthquake
programme.desc: When the Earth really moves, it means disaster on an epic scale. Desperate Hours looks at the destructive force of earthquakes and looks at the 2015 Kathmandu earthquake in Nepal, the 2008 Sichuan earthquake in China where an estimated 10,000 children were trapped in collapsed school buildings, a 1960 Puerto Mont earthquake in Chile, the 2010 Port-au-Princ earthquake in Haiti, and the 2005 Kashmir earthquake in Pakistan.

programme.title: Desperate Hours - S01:E03 - Epidemic
programme.desc: Desperate Hours looks at major epidemics including the African Ebola outbreak in Sudan which eventually led to cases in the United State and England, the Indian Smallpox outbreak in Bihar, the African Cholera outbreak, the SARS outbreak in Guanghzhou China, and the Bird Flu of Hong Kong.

programme.title: Desperate Hours - S01:E04 - Wind
programme.desc: Desperate Hours looks at the destructive power of wind. From the devastating power of Hurricane Katrina in New Orleans to the destructive Cyclone Nargis in Myanmar, the 1960 storm Hurricane Donna in Florida, Tornado Joplin in Missouri, and Hurricane Sandy in New York.

programme.title: Desperate Hours - S01:E05 - Fire
programme.desc: The blazing terror of a fire can match anything in creation for sheer menace. Desperate Hours looks at the destructive force of fires including the Black Saturday Bushfires in Victoria Australia, the Station Nightclub fire in Rhode Island, the LInnovation Department Store fire in Brussels Belgium, the Armoury fire in Lagos Nigeria, and the Binhai New Development Zone Fire in Tianjin China.

programme.title: The Trail - S01:E01 - Into the High Lonesome
programme.desc: Laramy Sasquatch Miller sets off on The Trail with his trusty horse 7, to test his survival skills and pay homage to mountain men of the past. Saying goodbye to his family, Laramy and 7 have to battle the elements, build shelter, live off of the land, and survive a 30-day trek through the backcountry.

programme.title: Love on the Reef
programme.desc: A smart and serious marine biologist and a fun-loving and laissez-faire dive instructor must team up to save their beloved reef from being destroyed before its too late.

programme.title: Deadly Secrets
programme.desc: When Jade finds out about her mothers financial problems, she joins her crush in a series of high-profile burglaries to pay off her mothers debts.

programme.title: The Love Advisor
programme.desc: Abby works as an assistant and writer of the popular podcast run by her former college friend Serena. Journalist comes from NYC to write about podcast and Serena. Abby starts to develop feelings, but Serena already has a plan for herself.

programme.title: Love Afloat
programme.desc: When Lorelei inherits a shabby sailboat from a distant relative, she hires Rob to help clean, fix and sail it from its present location at a Caribbean island to Miami. The two will have to work together as romantic sparks start to fly.

programme.title: Love for Starters
programme.desc: To save her fathers lake-front restaurant, a talented interior designer must partner with the celebrity chef her father hired without her knowledge to revamp the place before time runs out.

programme.title: Love in Translation
programme.desc: Linguistics Ph.D. student Julie, can speak almost every language you can imagine. Things turn upside down for Julie when handsome Dan, contacts her to get some French classes. Sparks soon fly - could this be their perfect match?

programme.title: Here Kills the Bride
programme.desc: Inspired by the Highly Acclaimed Thriller - The Perfect Bride Jessica is shocked to find out that her brother, Carlos, is getting married in a week to Grace, a girl he just met in a strip club, something he would never regularly do. Determined to find out the real reasons behind the marriage, Jessica gets pulled into a whirlwind of events, putting her own life at risk. Is Carlos in trouble? Or is Grace a victim?

programme.title: The Love Hunt
programme.desc: A high-powered real estate executive returns home after her dad passes, the only way shell inherit his estate is if she finds the only treasure that ever eluded him.

programme.title: Sorority Secrets
programme.desc: Cassie is thrilled when shes accepted as a mid-year transfer into an elite sorority, complete with free housing, tuition assistance and a great alumni network. However, when Cassie uncovers that the chapter president and advisor are running an escort service with girls from the sorority she realizes this little secret just might kill her

programme.title: Secret Lives of College Escorts
programme.desc: Eve and her friend sneak out for a party, but her friend winds up dead and Eve loses her college scholarship. Soon she finds a job to pay for tuition but her job was a front for the dangerous sugaring scheme that caused her friends death.
